This is it. Blizzard Activision added Overwatch reforge- i mean Overwatch 2 on steam. Now I can finally voice my inner rage that i've kept inside myself since this update (it's not a sequel, its an update, because you can't play the first game anymore).

I LOVED Overwatch. It was my favorite game in 2016. I fell in love with the gameplay, lore and characters. I had so much fun back then. Now the great GOTY is a shell of its former self. An empty shell that screams to your face: "spend your money".

Nowadays I don't think it's worth to spend your time on this game. Because of broken promises and greedy developer the game I loved, doesn't exist anymore, replaced by this cash grab. Don't play this game if you value your self-respect and your wallet.

This game does not deserve the 2 in the title. However it's good that i can proudly say i've enjoyed countless hour playing Overwatch, but i detest Overwatch 2.


Shame on you Blizzard.

守望先锋：归西，给暴雪一点3%的小小震撼

如何在不下载游戏的情况下愉快的打差评
评测条件：通过挂时长软件添加游戏累计6分钟即可

PC端：
watt toolkit（原steam++）
ASF
SAM

移动端：
云挂卡APP
如何从库中移除游戏
主页 > 帐户 > 许可和产品序列号激活：点击移除即可
或者
客服 >> 我想从帐户中移除这款游戏

来点客观评价
暴雪、考迪克死一死的话估计无数人在刷了，总要谈点客观的，不然会有些自觉中立的人说点未经他人苦，却劝他人善的风凉话

先说公事：
停更几年，画了N年大饼的守望先锋2就是这玩意？改动还没个版本更新大，这些年员工都在忙什么？办公室性骚扰？看看当年守望2预告CG动画里老玩家的弹幕，现今看来只有2个字：心寒。逼肝骗氪就不说了，反正暴雪现在也就只会这个，我的战役模式呢？信誓旦旦的PVE一拖再拖，张口就是为了玩家更好的体验这些晦涩难懂的词。

再聊私事：
账号承载着老玩家的青春回忆，见证了和朋友一起欢笑犯糗的时光。你说没就没，这就是您说的为了玩家？向钱看嘛，不寒掺，哪怕您站直了脊梁骨，说几句真话，我对您的鄙夷也能少那么几分，来洗的暴白也会多一点。中国玩家不重要，但中国玩家的真金白银很重要。


新玩家的避坑理由
在这里，你能感受到如同上班一样的游玩快感
在这里，你会发现皮肤出的比版本更新更加勤快
在这里，你可以体会到原汁原味的正宗暴雪式傲慢
在这里，你能够看到无数新的承诺簇拥出的艰难决定
在这里，你将游玩一个拒绝中国市场和中国玩家的高贵洋产，玩之前，先低头再折腰。

结语：
再不刷差评，我可要给三国杀打好评了哦

This game is the biggest slap in the face to any fan that played the first.

here's a fun reminder as to why Blizzard is going downhill and this game ended up the micro transaction filled broken promise that it is (keep in mind this game was announced in 2019):

- July 20, 2021 California lawsuit regarding the "Frat boy culture" at Blizzard with women stating they experienced "constant sexual harassment, unequal pay, and retaliation."  

- A few days later the BLIZZARD PRESIDENT claimed to know nothing about the harassment and wanted to ensure the well being and safety of his employees despite being mentioned by name as a part of the problem 

- Employee walkout demanding Bobby Kotic be fired

- The $72 billion dollar company got an $18 million fine for the harassment lawsuit

- Bobby Kotic snet death threats to his assistant, protected the harassers during the lawsuit ans refused to report the harassment to the board of directors  

- Some of Activision Blizzard’s Worst Offenders Frequented a Hotel Room Known as the “Cosby Suite”

- Blizzard Begins to Change In-Game Content Related to Accusations and the Investigation

- Blizzards was heavily against unions and stopped them forming at every opportunity 

- Blizzard Tried to Destroy and Hide Evidence during the investigations for the lawsuit

- Bobby Kotick Allegedly Considered Buying News Outlets to Control the Narrative

- The Blitzchung controversy

Heres the sources if you want to learn more: 
https://www.denofgeek.com/games/activision-blizzard-lawsuit-major-events-history-everything-explained/

1.0版本更新
我们的评价师认为，给守望先锋好评不利于其他游戏开发商的平台体验，所以为了优化steam平台其他游戏开发商的体验，我们决定对守望先锋给出“差评”，我们的评价师都对这次评价感到很兴奋，因为能够给暴雪和守望先锋差评，这实在是太coooooooooool了。
1.1版本更新
我们注意到最近有很多人给出了“差评”，有人抱怨是不是给“差评”太多了，我们的评价师已经了解到最近的一些抱怨，我们将持续关注后续的情况，enjoy~
